title: Certification
description: Certification bodies use this attestation when a subject passes certification.

attester.title: Certification Body ID
attester.description: DID of the Certification Body issuing the certification.

subject.title: Subject ID
subject.description: DID of the product, system, or organization being certified.

subjectDidHash.title: Subject DID Hash
subjectDidHash.description: Keccak256 hash of the canonicalized subject DID, encoded as 0x-prefixed hex string (32 bytes).

subjectOwner.title: Subject Owner ID
subjectOwner.description: DID of the entity responsible for the subject.  If there is no owner, leave blank.

subjectMetadataURI.title: Subject Informational URI
subjectMetadataURI.description: Optional URI controlled by the subject that provides mutable, human-readable metadata.

programIdentifier.title: Program ID
programIdentifier.description: DID of the certification program under which this certification was issued. Program release version should be included in the DID.

programMetadataURI.title: Program Informational URI
programMetadataURI.description: Optional URI for mutable, human-readable certification program info.

payloadVersion.title: Payload Version
payloadVersion.description: Semver describing the shape of 'payload' (additive changes may bump this without a new schema UID).

payloadSpecURI.title: Payload Specification URI
payloadSpecURI.description: URI to the JSON schema specification for this attestation type.

algo.title: Payload Spec Hash Algorithm
algo.description: Hash algorithm used for payload specification digest.

hex.title: Payload Spec Hash Value
hex.description: 0x-prefixed hex digest of the payload specification.

payload.title: Certification Payload
payload.description: Extended certification details. Evolvable without changing the envelope. When stored on-chain via EAS, this object is JSON-stringified.

assessor.title: Assessor DID
assessor.description: DID of the authorized assessor (test lab, auditor) who evaluated the subject.

assessorMetadataURI.title: Assessor Informational URI
assessorMetadataURI.description: Optional URI with human-readable info about the assessor (e.g., homepage, credentials).

version.title: Software Version
version.description: Software version of the certified subject.

versionHW.title: Hardware Version
versionHW.description: Hardware version of the certified subject, if applicable.

effectiveAt.title: Effective Date
effectiveAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) when the certification becomes effective.

issuedAt.title: Issued Date
issuedAt.description: Optional timestamp (in seconds) when the certification was issued.
